tweet_text: We also expanded eligibility for Medicare Part D Low-Income Subsidies to include incomes up to 150 percent of the poverty level, increasing benefits for 1,700 Rhode Islanders. 6/8

tweet_text: This law caps insulin costs at $35 per month for seniors and individuals with disabilities on Medicare. In 2020 alone, 11,000 Rhode Islanders on Medicare used insulin. 5/8

name: Congressman David N. Cicilline
tweet_text:

name: Congressman David N. Cicilline
tweet_text:
